All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
DynamicHint
Helper class to display themed cheat sheets with icon and text by using Toast.
DynamicHint.Config
Configuration class to customise the DynamicHint attributes.
DynamicToast
Helper class to display themed Toast with icon and text.
DynamicToast.Config
Configuration class to customise the DynamicToast attributes.
ToastCompat
A Toast to fix the bad token exception on API 25.
ToastContext
A ContextWrapper to fix bad token exception.
